attributes.action: instruct his Ministers to use the existing laws of the UK to encourage respect for authority, tolerance of others and traditional British values.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police, teachers, parents and ordinary people are being undermined by government regulation in their efforts to encourage a tolerant, law abiding and fair society. Rather than regulate to try to control people's attitudes the government should reflect British common sense and encourage reasonableness.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
